item.title: City Maps
item.description:
A script I wrote to generate artistic city maps from OpenStreeMap. The script downloads the data to disk and reloads it to memory, to finally create the plot. The script automatically adjusts (roughly, according to the 1Â° lat = 111,111m rule) the coordinates to your aspect ratio in order to avoid distortions of the map. I did not manage to remove the white space on the top and right side of the plot. In addition, the code developed from a specific city to general, so there are many inherited inconveniences, especially in terms of size scaling.

Download the script here
